--- id: jwks-rotation-state title: "SmartEdify – JWKS Key State Lifecycle" description: "State machine for provisioning, promoting, retiring, and purging signing keys exposed via JWKS." updated: 2025-02-14 tags: [FinTech_PaymentGateway] --- stateDiagram-v2 [FinTech_FraudDetection] --> Provisioning Provisioning --> Current: Activated Current --> Retiring: Key Rotation Initiated Retiring --> Deprecated: Grace Window Expired Deprecated --> Purge: TTL / Manual Cleanup Purge --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway] note right of Provisioning: Generate key pair
Store kid + created_at note right of Current: Signs new tokens
JWKS exposes kid note right of Retiring: Valid for verification only
New tokens use CURRENT note right of Deprecated: Should not verify (FinTech_LedgerService) note right of Purge: Row deletion or archive

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_LedgerService。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_LedgerService'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
